casebody.data:
BEAR VALLEY MUTUAL WATER COMPANY, et al., petitioners,
v.
Sally JEWELL, Secretary of the Interior, et al. No. 15-367. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 11, 2016.

Motion of Pacific Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of Association of California Water Agencies, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.
